level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 2382(a), (c) of Fiscal Year 2006 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2005 (D.C. Act 16-168, July 26, 2005, 52 DCR 7667).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-95, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-215.01.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: "(c) An order, rule, or regulation in effect under a law repealed by this section shall remain in effect under the corresponding provision enacted by this subtitle [subtitle N of title II, §§ 2301 to 2391, of D.C. Law 16-33] until repealed, amended, or superseded.".
